abstract: Bank of America is running out of time to fulfill a promise to raise more capital by year-end and may be forced to make up the shortfall by paying some bonuses in stock rather than cash.
snippet: Bank of America is running out of time to fulfill a promise to raise more capital by year-end and may be forced to make up the shortfall by paying some bonuses in stock rather than cash.
lead_paragraph: Bank of America is running out of time to fulfill a promise to raise more capital by year-end and may be forced to make up the shortfall by paying some bonuses in stock rather than cash, Bloomberg News reports.

headline.main: Bank of America May Pay Bonuses in Shares

abstract: Robert Zoellick advocates a return to a modified version of the gold standard, as opposed to floating exchange rates.
snippet: Robert Zoellick advocates a return to a modified version of the gold standard, as opposed to floating exchange rates.
lead_paragraph: This proposal was somewhat unexpected, considering the source:

headline.main: World Bank President Advocates … the Gold Standard?
